detailsData.title: Free Consultations
detailsData.content: Whenever and wherever is most convenient for our clients. GJEL Accident Attorneys offers free consultations to discuss your case.

detailsData.title: 99% Success Rate
detailsData.content: With over 99% success rate, GJEL Accident Attorneys have proven their dedication to winning cases for their clients.

detailsData.title: No Fees Unless We Win
detailsData.content: You won't pay any fees unless GJEL wins your case. They ensure there's no financial risk to you in pursuing your claim.

detailsData.title: Over $980+ Million Recovered
detailsData.content: GJEL Accident Attorneys have recovered over $980 million for their clients, showcasing their ability to secure significant settlements.

subHeading: TOP RATED CALIFORNIA PERSONAL INJURY LAWYERS
valueProp: You shouldn't settle for less. We won't. If you or someone you love was seriously injured or killed, contact GJEL, the firm that will have your back every step of the way.
CTA: Secure Your Free Case Evaluation Today

testimonalData.text: I cannot recommend GJEL Accident Attorneys enough. I worked with both Andy Gillin and Jim Larsen. They got me the best possible settlement from my bike accident.
testimonalData.author: E.A.

testimonalData.text: GJEL was responsive and fair. You did a Great Job!
testimonalData.author: R.B.

testimonalData.text: The Law Firm of GJEL was excellent and kept me informed. For Results, Call GJEL.
testimonalData.author: E.M.
